1. 'Nudify' Apps That Use AI to 'Undress' Women in Photos Are Soaring in Popularity  TIME
  2. Mother of 14-year-old victimized in deep fake pornographic video works with Morelle to make it a federal crime  News10NBC
  3. Apps That Undress Women's Photos Surge In Popularity. What Could Go Wrong?  Forbes
  4. Study: Websites using AI to undress individuals soar in usage  Marketing Interactive
